description.value:
You deliver poisons in ways that maximize their harmful effects. When you apply a simple poison with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Poison Weapon], the poison deals [[/r 2d4[poison]]] damage instead of [[/r 1d4[poison]]] damage. You don't waste a poison you apply with Poison Weapon on a critically failed attack roll.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Improved Poison Weapon]
